text: Jaime Fernando Nicolás Thorne León (11 September 1943 – 5 April 2018) was a Peruvian politician. He served as the Minister of Defense under the administration of President Alan García Pérez, from September 2010 to July 2011.Appointment , andina.com.pe; accessed 7 April 2018.CIA World Leaders "Peru, China sign military cooperation agreement", The Peruvian Times, 4 May 2011. Thorne León died in Lima, Peru of brain cancer on 5 April 2018 at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Peruvian lawyers Category:Politicians from Lima
title: Jaime Thorne León
